mapper.select: SELECT cs.hp_company_store_id FROM hp_company_store cs WHERE cs.store_token=#{storeToken}

choose.when: SELECT aci.city_id areaId,aci.city_name areaName FROM hp_area_city aci WHERE aci.province_id=#{provinceId}
SELECT aco.county_id areaId,aco.county_name areaName FROM hp_area_county aco WHERE aco.city_id=#{cityId}
choose.otherwise: SELECT ap.province_id areaId,ap.province_name areaName FROM hp_area_province ap
